Question: What are the names and dates of birth of the players who were part of the 'Germany 2014' squad, played in matches located in Rio de Janeiro, and scored at least four goals throughout the tournament?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Germany"})-[participates:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Germany 2014"})
MATCH (squad:Squad)<-[named:NAMED]-(team)
MATCH (player:Person)-[in_squad:IN_SQUAD]->(squad)
MATCH (player)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tour:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
WITH player, COUNT(scored) AS goals
WHERE goals >= 4
RETURN player, in_squad, squad, named, team, participates, tournament, in_tour, match, played, scored, player.name, player.dob
Semantic-EQL-Question: Who were the players from Germany who scored at least four goals in a match during the "Germany 2014" tournament, and what are their names and dates of birth?

Question: Identify the years and names of all tournaments in which players born after 1985, who played in the 'England' team and scored during penalty shootouts, have participated.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"England"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
MATCH (player)-[in_squad:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (squad)-[for_tourn:FOR]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE player.dob > date("1985-12-31") AND played.type = "penalty" AND played.score > 0
RETURN team, represents, player, played, match, in_squad, squad, for_tourn, tournament, tournament.year, tournament.name
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name: "England"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (player)-[born_after:DOB]->(dob:Date)
MATCH (match)-[in_match:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE dob.year > 1985 AND scored.type = "penalty"
RETURN represents, team, match, scored, player, born_after, dob, in_match, tournament, tournament.year, tournament.name
Rewrite: List all tournaments, including their names and years, where players who were born post-1985 and scored in penalty shootouts while playing for the 'England' team have participated.

Question: Provide the names and squad IDs for squads that participated in the 'France 1998' tournament, included players who scored goals in both group stages and knockout stages, and represented more than one nationality.
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "France 1998"})<-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(team:Team)
MATCH (team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (player:Person)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tour:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage IN ['group stage', 'knockout stage']
WITH player, squad, COUNT(DISTINCT match.stage) AS stagesCount
WHERE stagesCount = 2
MATCH (player)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team)
WITH squad, COUNT(DISTINCT team) AS teamsCount
WHERE teamsCount > 1
RETURN squad, squad.id, tournament, in_tournament, team, participated, squad, player, played, match, in_tour, represents, teamsCount, stagesCount, squad.id
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "France 1998"})<-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]-(team:Team)
MATCH (team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(squad:Squad)
MATCH (player:Person)-[played:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tour:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage IN ['group stage', 'knockout stage']
WITH player, squad, COUNT(DISTINCT match.stage) AS stagesCount
WHERE stagesCount = 2
MATCH (player)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team)
WITH squad, COUNT(DISTINCT team) AS teamsCount
WHERE teamsCount > 1
RETURN squad, squad.id, tournament, in_tournament, team, participated, player, played, match, in_tour, represents, teamsCount, stagesCount

Question: List the match IDs and the respective stages of matches where players over 35 years old scored from the 'Spain' team during the 'EURO 2020' campaign.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Spain"})<-[represent:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"EURO 2020"})
WHERE player.dob <= date("1985-01-01")
RETURN team, represent, player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, match.id, match.stage
Rewrite: Provide the identifiers and corresponding stages of games involving the 'Spain' team during the 'EURO 2020' where players aged over 35 scored.

Question: Retrieve the names of head coaches and the corresponding squad IDs for the teams that reached the semi-finals of the 'Brazil 2014' World Cup and had players scoring goals in the quarter-finals.
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "Brazil 2014"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage = "semi-final"
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
MATCH (team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(quarter_final_match:Match)-[in_quarter_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE quarter_final_match.stage = "quarter-final"
MATCH (team)<-[represent:REPRESENTS]-(player)
MATCH (squad:Squad)<-[named:NAMED]-(team)
MATCH (coach:Person)-[coach_for:COACH_FOR]->(squad)
RETURN team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, player, scored, quarter_final_match, in_quarter_tournament, represent, squad, named, coach, coach_for, coach.name, squad.id
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "Brazil 2014"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE match.stage = "semi-final"
MATCH (team:Team)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
MATCH (team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(quarter_final_match:Match)-[in_quarter_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE quarter_final_match.stage = "quarter-final"
MATCH (team)<-[represent:REPRESENTS]-(player)
MATCH (squad:Squad)<-[named:NAMED]-(team)
MATCH (coach:Person)-[coach_for:COACH_FOR]->(squad)
RETURN participated, team, played_in, match, in_tournament, tournament, player, scored, quarter_final_match, in_quarter_tournament, represent, squad, named, coach, coach_for, coach.name, squad.id
Semantic-EQL-Question: Can you identify the squads and their corresponding coaches involved in the "Brazil 2014" tournament during the quarter-final and semi-final stages?
Rewrite: Fetch the names of head coaches along with the squad IDs for teams that made it to the semi-finals of the 'Brazil 2014' World Cup and had players who scored in the quarter-finals.

Question: Can you display the tournament names and the birthdates of players who represented 'Argentina', had a squad ID of 'ARG-20', and participated in matches held in Buenos Aires?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name: "Argentina"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[in_squad:IN_SQUAD]->(squad:Squad {id: "ARG-20"})
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tour:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE match.location = "Buenos Aires"
RETURN team, represents, player, in_squad, squad, played_in, match, in_tour, tournament, tournament.name, player.dob

Question: In what minutes did players from the 'Italy' squad score during the group match against 'Brazil' and the quarter-final against 'Germany' in the 'Italy 1990' World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (italy_team:Team {name:"Italy"})<-[represent_italy_players:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person), 
      (player)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match), 
      (match)-[match_in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(world_cup:Tournament {name:"Italy 1990"})
MATCH (opponent_team:Team)-[opponent_played:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE (opponent_team.name="Brazil" AND match.stage="group match") OR (opponent_team.name="Germany" AND match.stage="quarter-final")
RETURN italy_team, represent_italy_players, player, scored_goal, match, match_in_tournament, world_cup, opponent_team, opponent_played, scored_goal.minute
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (italy_team:Team {name: "Italy"})-[:REPRESENTS]->(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[InTour:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(world_cup:Tournament {name: "Italy 1990"})
WHERE (match.stage="group" AND EXISTS((match)<-[:PLAYED_IN]-(opponent:Team {name: "Brazil"}))) 
   OR (match.stage="quarter-final" AND EXISTS((match)<-[:PLAYED_IN]-(opponent:Team {name: "Germany"})))
RETURN relation9, relation6, italy_team, player, scored, match, InTour, world_cup, opponent, scored.minute
Rewrite: During which minutes did 'Italy' team members score in the group stage match against 'Brazil' and in the quarter-final versus 'Germany' during the 'Italy 1990' World Cup?

Question: Detail the minute and type of playing (starter or substitute) for goals scored by 'France' team members in matches that went to extra time during the 'South Africa 2010' World Cup.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[represent:REPRESENTS]->(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"South Africa 2010"})
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE match.stage = "extra time"
RETURN team, represent, player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, played_in, scored.minute, played_in.type
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"France"})-[represent:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)
MATCH (player)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"South Africa 2010"})
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE match.stage = "extra time"
RETURN team, represent, player, scored, match, in_tournament, tournament, played_in, scored.minute, played_in.type
Rewrite: List the exact minutes and player roles (starting or coming off the bench) for goals scored by 'France' team players during extra time in matches of the 'South Africa 2010' World Cup.

Question: Which minutes saw goals scored by defenders playing for 'Netherlands' in the 'Euro 2008', during games that were decided by a margin of more than two goals?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Netherlands"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[played:PLAYED_IN {type:"defender"}]->(team)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Euro 2008"})
WHERE abs(played.score - played.penaltyScore) > 2
RETURN team, represents, player, scored, match, played, in_tournament, tournament, scored.minute
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team {name:"Netherlands"})<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)
MATCH (match)-[played:PLAYED_IN {type:"defender"}]-(team)
MATCH (match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament {name:"Euro 2008"})
WHERE abs(played.score - played.penaltyScore) > 2
RETURN team, represents, player, scored, match, played, in_tournament, tournament, scored.minute
Rewrite: During which minutes did defenders from the 'Netherlands' score goals in 'Euro 2008' matches that were won by more than two goals?

Question: How did the relationship between players scoring in the first half and their teams' progression to the next round manifest in the 'USA 1994' World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "USA 1994"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
WHERE toInteger(scored_goal.minute) <= 45
MATCH (player)-[represents:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
MATCH (team)-[participated:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament)
MATCH (team)-[played_in_team:PLAYED_IN]->(next_match:Match)-[in_next_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
WHERE next_match.date > match.date
RETURN tournament, in_tournament, match, next_match, in_next_tournament, player, scored_goal, represents, team, participated, played_in_team, scored_goal.minute
Semantic-EQL-Question: Which players managed to score within the first half and appeared in later games of the 1994 USA World Cup?
Rewrite: How was the correlation between players who scored in the first half and their teams advancing to the next round demonstrated during the 'USA 1994' World Cup?

Question: Report the minute on and score details for goals that led to a team comeback in the second half during the knockout stages of 'Euro 2012'.
Cypher:
MATCH (match:Match)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(team:Team)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
MATCH (team)-[participated_in:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {name: "Euro 2012"})
WHERE match.stage CONTAINS "knockout" AND toInteger(scored_goal.minute) >= 45 AND (played_in.score <> 0 OR played_in.penaltyScore <> 0)
RETURN match, played_in, team, player, scored_goal, participated_in, tournament, scored_goal.minute, played_in.score, played_in.penaltyScore
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (match:Match)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]-(team:Team)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored_goal:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
MATCH (team)-[participated_in:PARTICIPATED_IN]->(tournament:Tournament {name: "Euro 2012"})
WHERE match.stage CONTAINS "knockout" AND toInteger(scored_goal.minute) >= 45 AND (played_in.score <> 0 OR played_in.penaltyScore <> 0)
RETURN match, played_in, team, player, scored_goal, participated_in, tournament, scored_goal.minute, played_in.score, played_in.penaltyScore
Rewrite: Provide information on the timing and scoring of goals that facilitated a team's comeback in the second half of the knockout rounds of 'Euro 2012'.

Question: What are the penalty score situations and players involved for matches in the 'Germany 2006' World Cup that had winning goals scored in the final 5 minutes of regular time?
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament {name: "Germany 2006"})
MATCH (match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament)
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
MATCH (team:Team)<-[represents:REPRESENTS]-(player)
WHERE scored.minute >= "85"
RETURN match, in_tournament, tournament, player, scored, played_in, team, represents, played_in.score, played_in.penaltyScore
Rewrite: What are the circumstances and players associated with penalty scores during the 'Germany 2006' World Cup for matches where the winning goals were made in the last 5 minutes of regular play?

Question: Compute the average minute of goals scored by forwards in the 'Final' matches from the last three FIFA World Cups.
Cypher:
MATCH (tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name CONTAINS "FIFA World Cup" AND tournament.year >= (date().year - 12)
WITH collect(tournament) AS recentTournaments
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(recentTournament)
WHERE recentTournament IN recentTournaments AND match.stage="Final" AND scored.type="Forward"
RETURN AVG(toInteger(scored.minute))

Question: What is the total number of goals scored in matches where at least one player from 'Mexico' was sent off with a red card during the tournament?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[represent:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
MATCH (player)-[played_in:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[in_tournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE team.name = "Mexico" AND played_in.type = "Red Card"
MATCH (scorer:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match)
RETURN SUM(scored) AS total_goals

Question: How many players, who have scored more than three goals in 'World Cup 2018', were aged 30 or older at the time of the tournament?
Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[in:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="World Cup 2018" AND tournament.year=2018
WITH player, COUNT(scored) AS goals
WHERE goals > 3
MATCH (player)-[:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
WITH player, goals, duration.between(player.dob, date({year: 2018, month: 6, day: 14})).years AS ageAtTournament
WHERE ageAtTournament >= 30
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)
Corrected-Cypher:
MATCH (player:Person)-[scored:SCORED_GOAL]->(match:Match)-[in:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="World Cup 2018" AND tournament.year=2018
WITH player, COUNT(scored) AS goals
WHERE goals > 3
MATCH (player)-[relation6:REPRESENTS]->(team:Team)
WITH player, goals, duration.between(player.dob, date({year: 2018, month: 6, day: 14})).years AS ageAtTournament
WHERE ageAtTournament >= 30
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT player)
Rewrite: How many participants in 'World Cup 2018' were 30 years or older and scored more than three goals during the tournament?

Question: Calculate the minimum and maximum penalty scores achieved by teams in semi-final matches, from World Cups held between 2002 and 2014.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.year >= 2002 AND tournament.year <= 2014 AND match.stage = "Semi-final"
RETURN MIN(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS MinPenaltyScore, MAX(playedIn.penaltyScore) AS MaxPenaltyScore
Rewrite: Determine the lowest and highest penalty scores recorded by teams during semi-final games in World Cups between 2002 and 2014.

Question: Identify the number of times teams trailing at halftime went on to win the match during 'Euro 2004'.
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[firstHalf:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name = 'Euro 2004' AND firstHalf.type = 'First Half' AND firstHalf.score < 0
WITH match, team
MATCH (team)-[secondHalf:PLAYED_IN]->(match)
WHERE secondHalf.type = 'Second Half' AND secondHalf.score > 0
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT match)
Rewrite: Determine how often teams that were behind at halftime managed to win the game in 'Euro 2004'.

Question: What is the sum of scores from matches that went into extra time during the 'France 1998' FIFA World Cup?
Cypher:
MATCH (team:Team)-[playedIn:PLAYED_IN]->(match:Match)-[inTournament:IN_TOURNAMENT]->(tournament:Tournament)
WHERE tournament.name="France 1998" AND match.stage="Extra Time"
RETURN SUM(playedIn.score)
Rewrite: What is the total of scores from games that extended into extra time in the 'France 1998' FIFA World Cup?
